CD will be advised, followed by
radical surgery or other treatment modalities, according to the stage of the disease. It is important that women with
cervical cancer have a delivery plan in place, scheduled at a tertiary/quaternary facility.
Breast cancer 
Overview  
Breast cancer, although uncommon, is the most prevalent malignancy encountered in pregnancy. Most patients are 
diagnosed in the late stages of the disease due to pregnancy -related changes in the breast that pose a diagnostic
